segments.text: What is your favorite kind of music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I listen to various types of music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I enjoy listening to both Rock and R & B .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What interests you in that type of music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoy the different types of instruments that they use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is a perfect reason to like a certain kind of music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's exactly what I think too .
segments.speaker: S2
